newsitem.title: JAPAN: Foreigners net sellers of Japan stock via 11 firms.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners net sellers of Japan stock via 11 firms.

text.p: Orders placed by foreign investors through 11 foreign securities houses before the start of stock trading on Tuesday showed a net selling stance of 400,000 million shares, market sources said.
Foreign investors' buy orders totalled 23.9 million shares while sell orders amounted to 24.3 million.
